PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1996-09871996-06-200,  ,  CITIZENSHIP,  , 
PrecisAppointment of certain persons as full-time members of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montreal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour, for a term of three years, effective August 5, 1996. (MARTINE LAVOIE, Montreal, Quebec; JOHN PISCIUNERI, Montreal, Quebec; JEAN-CHRISTOPHE SENOSIER, Bois des Filion, Quebec; and DOMINIQUE LECLERCQ, Montreal, Quebec)
